description.zh-cn: 一个于1918年至1992年间存在的中欧国家，为现今捷克与斯洛伐克的前身。期间经历了从民主共和国到社会主义国家，最终和平分裂为两个独立国家。
description.en: A country in Central Europe that existed from 1918 to 1992, the predecessor to the modern-day Czech Republic and Slovakia. It transitioned from a democratic republic to a socialist state, and ultimately dissolved peacefully into two separate nations.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲历史上的一个二元君主国，捷克斯洛伐克地区在其解体前是其一部分。
description.en: A dual monarchy in European history. The region of Czechoslovakia was part of it before its dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后奥匈帝国瓦解的事件，直接导致了捷克斯洛伐克等多个新国家的成立。
description.en: The dissolution of Austria-Hungary after World War I, which directly led to the formation of several new states, including Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克解体后成立的国家之一。
description.en: One of the successor states to Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克解体后成立的国家之一。
description.en: One of the successor states to Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 指1993年1月1日捷克斯洛伐克和平地分裂为捷克共和国和斯洛伐克共和国的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on January 1, 1993, when Czechoslovakia peacefully split into the Czech Republic and Slovakia.

description.zh-cn: 1939年吞并捷克斯洛伐克的国家。
description.en: The state that annexed Czechoslovakia in 1939.

nodes.id: 波希米亚和摩拉维亚保护国

zh-cn: 波希米亚和摩拉维亚保护国

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在吞并的捷克地区成立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Nazi Germany in the annexed Czech territory.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在斯洛伐克地区成立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Nazi Germany in the Slovak territory.

description.zh-cn: 在二战后对捷克斯洛伐克政治有巨大影响力的社会主义国家，并在1968年主导了对该国的军事入侵。
description.en: A socialist state that had immense political influence over Czechoslovakia after World War II and led the military invasion of the country in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 在1948年至1989年间在捷克斯洛伐克实行一党专政的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party that exercised one-party rule in Czechoslovakia from 1948 to 1989.

nodes.id: 捷克斯洛伐克1948年二月事件

zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克1948年二月事件

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党在苏联支持下发动的政变，此后捷克斯洛伐克成为社会主义国家。
description.en: A coup d'état launched by the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia with Soviet support, after which Czechoslovakia became a socialist state.

nodes.id: 捷克斯洛伐克社会主义共和国

zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克在1960年更改国名后的正式名称，是该国社会主义时期的主要阶段。
description.en: The official name of Czechoslovakia after its name change in 1960, representing the main phase of its socialist period.

description.zh-cn: 由苏联领导的东欧社会主义国家组成的军事同盟，捷克斯洛伐克是其成员国。
description.en: A military alliance of Eastern European socialist states led by the Soviet Union, of which Czechoslovakia was a member.

description.zh-cn: 1968年在捷克斯洛伐克发生的一场政治民主化改革运动，最终被苏联及华约成员国武装入侵所镇压。
description.en: A political liberalization and democratization movement in Czechoslovakia in 1968, which was ultimately suppressed by an armed invasion by the Soviet Union and Warsaw Pact member states.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克政治家，曾任捷克斯洛伐克共产党第一书记，是“布拉格之春”改革运动的主要领导人。
description.en: Czechoslovak politician, former First Secretary of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, and a leading figure in the 'Prague Spring' reform movement.

nodes.id: 华约入侵捷克斯洛伐克

zh-cn: 华约入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 1968年苏联及华沙条约组织成员国对捷克斯洛伐克进行的军事入侵，旨在镇压“布拉格之春”改革。
description.en: The 1968 military invasion of Czechoslovakia by the Soviet Union and its Warsaw Pact allies, aimed at suppressing the 'Prague Spring' reforms.

description.zh-cn: 1989年11月在捷克斯洛伐克发生的一场非暴力革命，结束了共产党的统治。
description.en: A non-violent revolution that took place in Czechoslovakia in November 1989, ending the rule of the Communist Party.

nodes.id: 捷克和斯洛伐克联邦共和国

zh-cn: 捷克和斯洛伐克联邦共和国
捷克斯洛伐克联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克在天鹅绒革命后、正式解体前所使用的国名。
description.en: The name of Czechoslovakia after the Velvet Revolution and before its final dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克首任总统。
description.en: The first President of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克政治家，曾两次担任总统。
description.en: Czechoslovak politician who served as President on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党领导人，曾任总理和总统。
description.en: Leader of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, who served as Prime Minister and President.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党领导人，布拉格之春后上台，曾任第一书记/总书记和总统。
description.en: Leader of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia who came to power after the Prague Spring, serving as First Secretary/General Secretary and President.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克最后一任总统，也是捷克共和国第一任总统。
description.en: The last President of Czechoslovakia and the first President of the Czech Republic.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党领导人，曾任第一书记和总统。
description.en: Leader of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, who served as First Secretary and President.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党领导人，天鹅绒革命前夕的最后一任总书记。
description.en: Leader of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, the last General Secretary before the Velvet Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1938年英、法、德、意四国签署的协议，在未经捷克斯洛伐克同意的情况下将其苏台德区割让给德国。
description.en: An agreement signed in 1938 by the UK, France, Germany, and Italy, which ceded the Sudetenland region of Czechoslovakia to Germany without its consent.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国在第一次世界大战后解体，为捷克斯洛伐克的独立建国创造了条件。
description.en: The dissolution of Austria-Hungary after World War I created the conditions for the independent state of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 慕尼黑协定在未经捷克斯洛伐克代表同意的情况下，决定将其西部领土苏台德区割让给德国，严重损害了其主权和领土完整。
description.en: The Munich Agreement, without the consent of Czechoslovak representatives, decided to cede its western territory, the Sudetenland, to Germany, severely undermining its sovereignty and territorial integrity.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国于1939年3月出兵吞并整个捷克斯洛伐克，导致其亡国。
description.en: Nazi Germany sent troops to annex the entirety of Czechoslovakia in March 1939, leading to the fall of the state.

relationships.target: 波希米亚和摩拉维亚保护国

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在吞并的捷克地区成立了波希米亚和摩拉维亚保护国作为傀儡政权。
description.en: Nazi Germany established the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia as a puppet state in the annexed Czech territory.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在斯洛伐克地区成立了受其保护的斯洛伐克共和国傀儡政权。
description.en: Nazi Germany established the Slovak Republic, a protectorate puppet state, in the Slovak territory.

relationships.target: 捷克斯洛伐克1948年二月事件

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克共产党在苏联扶持下发动了“二月事件”政变。
description.en: The Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, with Soviet support, launched the 'February coup'.

relationships.source: 捷克斯洛伐克1948年二月事件
relationships.target: 捷克斯洛伐克社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 二月事件政变后，捷克斯洛伐克成为亲苏联的社会主义国家。
description.en: After the February coup, Czechoslovakia became a pro-Soviet socialist state.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，捷克斯洛伐克加入华沙公约组织，与东欧大部分共产主义国家结成军事同盟。
description.en: In 1955, Czechoslovakia joined the Warsaw Pact, forming a military alliance with most of the communist countries in Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 时任捷克斯洛伐克共产党第一书记的亚历山大·杜布切克发动了“布拉格之春”的经济和政治改革运动。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, Alexander Dubček, launched the 'Prague Spring' economic and political reform movement.

relationships.target: 华约入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 由于“布拉格之春”改革为苏联所不容，苏联主导了对捷克斯洛伐克的军事入侵。
description.en: As the 'Prague Spring' reforms were unacceptable to the Soviet Union, it led the military invasion of Czechoslovakia.

relationships.source: 华约入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 苏联及华约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克，导致布拉格之春改革运动戛然而止。
description.en: The invasion of Czechoslovakia by the Soviet Union and Warsaw Pact members brought the Prague Spring reform movement to an abrupt end.

description.zh-cn: 天鹅绒革命结束了捷克斯洛伐克共产党的一党专政。
description.en: The Velvet Revolution ended the one-party rule of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia.

relationships.target: 捷克和斯洛伐克联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 天鹅绒革命后，捷克斯洛伐克废除社会主义体制，并改名为捷克和斯洛伐克联邦共和国。
description.en: After the Velvet Revolution, Czechoslovakia abolished its socialist system and was renamed the Czech and Slovak Federative Republic.

description.zh-cn: 天鹅绒分离事件导致捷克斯洛伐克正式解体。
description.en: The Velvet Divorce event led to the formal dissolution of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克通过天鹅绒分离事件解体，成立了独立的捷克共和国。
description.en: Czechoslovakia dissolved through the Velvet Divorce, leading to the establishment of the independent Czech Republic.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克通过天鹅绒分离事件解体，成立了独立的斯洛伐克共和国。
description.en: Czechoslovakia dissolved through the Velvet Divorce, leading to the establishment of the independent Slovak Republic.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克第一任总统。
description.en: First President of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克第二任及第四任总统。
description.en: Second and fourth President of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克第五任总统，也是第一位共产党总统。
description.en: Fifth President of Czechoslovakia, and the first communist president.

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克共产党主席。
description.en: Served as Chairman of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克共产党第一书记。
description.en: Served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克共产党第一书记，领导了布拉格之春改革。
description.en: Served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia, leading the Prague Spring reforms.

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克总统。
description.en: Served as President of Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克共产党最高领导人。
description.en: Served as the supreme leader of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia.

relationships.target: 捷克和斯洛伐克联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 担任捷克斯洛伐克最后一任总统。
description.en: Served as the last President of Czechoslovakia.
